    • onInsertMovement

      private void onInsertMovement​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Insert button action Inserts a registry in the TableView and the DB. When a movement is inserted, table is updated with the month of that inserted movement.
      Parameters:
      event -

    • onFilterNegativeCheck

    • onNoFilterCheck
